Headline: Temporary Westbound #20 Madison Reroute near Madison/Hamlin
ShortDescription: Westbound 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted near Madison/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Hamlin, Washington, Pulaski, Madison, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Madison/Hamlin.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove and #6 Jackson Park Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Monroe
ShortDescription: NB #3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove & #6 Jackson Park buses are rr via Michigan, Adams, State, Washington & Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/Monroe

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect m trip?

Northbound #3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove and #6 Jackson Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Adams, State, Washington, Michigan, then resume normal route, due to street blockage near Michigan/Monroe.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Pink Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
